item.title: This Will Make You Tear Up: How One Person's Childhood Home Quote Showed the Power of Love
item.description: Introduction A few years ago, a simple quote from a childhood home made its way around the internet and touched the hearts of many It reads, “Home is where your story begins” This quote, which is often attributed to author Robert Brault, speaks to the power of love and how it can be found in the most unexpected places In this blog post, we’ll explore the impact of this quote and how it relates to childhood homes
